title: How To Become The Girl Men Adore
description: Everyone I meet want to know how it is that I have the most success with men and not only keep them happy but experience an enjoyable relationship myself. I have had several fun (and several not so fun!) relationships before I settled down with the love of my life and during that time learnt some very important pointers. In this report I have written to help others I seperate the important facts that you just wont hear from other women laid out as honestly as possible. I really wish this information was available to me many moons ago when I first started out dating.
author: Cheryl L. Cole
